EXPERIMENT.TITLE: Genomic sequence of Sars-CoV-2 from wastewater

DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Metagenomic monitoring of SARS-CoV-2 in effluents in Rio de Janeiro.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: Wastewater surveillance may represent a complementary approach in detecting SARS-CoV-2. The virus research in effluents will be done by metagenomic approach, initially quantified by RT-qPCR and confirmed by MiSeq/Illumina sequencing. Data interpreted by comparative analysis in databases and phylogenetic analyses. Our results may reveal the genetic diversity and prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 in Brazilian effluents.
